job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Kubernetes, Helm Charts, DevOps<br>AWS<br>Hands on experience in Kubernetes<br>Hands on experience in Helm charts<br>Deep experience in setting up/maintain CI/CD pipelines and the processes(GitLab/Jenkins/Bamboo).<br>Experience with modern observability/monitoring systems such as Splunk, Grafana, Prometheus<br>Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools and best practices such as Terraform or CloudFormation, as well as knowledge of configuration management systems (Puppet/Chef/Ansible/Salt).
